coreAttributes.name: pleated microskirt
coreAttributes.description: Consisting of little more than a narrow band of pleated fabric, this microskirt is so short that it leaves its wearer's private parts completely exposed.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the pleated microskirt and [npc.verb(pull)] it up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the pleated microskirt, before pulling it up around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the pleated microskirt, before yanking it up around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] pleated microskirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] pleated microskirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] pleated microskirt, before yanking it off.
